heroText: Take a juicy bite out of life, where the fun is always fresh off thegrill!
descriptionLandingPage: At Burger Land, our towering sesame-seed-bun mountains and twisty fry coasters are just the beginning! Marvel at our milkshake river, giggle through ketchup cannon shows, and share unforgettable moments with the whole family in this wacky world of treats and thrills. Get ready to feast on more than just burgers—you’ll feast on FUN!
